errors.error_description: Adding unnecessary dependencies (cryptography and setuptools) to the basic installation command
correction_candidates: Remove cryptography and setuptools from the installation command
Install cryptography and setuptools separately after pysnmplib
Use pip install pysnmplib[crypto] for optional cryptographic dependencies
Replace cryptography with pycryptodome in the installation command
errors.golden_answer: Remove cryptography and setuptools from the installation command

errors.error_description: Referencing a non-existent configuration file path /etc/pysnmp/config.ini
correction_candidates: Remove the configuration file requirement as it's not needed
Change the path to ~/.pysnmp/config.ini for user-specific configuration
Reference the examples directory for configuration templates
Point to the project's documentation for configuration instructions
errors.golden_answer: Remove the configuration file requirement as it's not needed
